explanation: "Gem" and "angel" are both terms used to referred to a much loved person. "Glean vigorously" (i.e. GLEAN rearranged) reveals ANGEL.
hints: "Revealing" is being used to link the wordplay and definition.
The question mark tells that the definition might be a little loose or metaphorical.
"Vigorously" is telling us to rearrange a word.
